name: peggotty light
notes:
this is a lightweight version of the original [peggotty hat][1]. peggotty light uses sportweight yarn and the original peggotty uses bulky.

pattern has both written and charted instructions.

**materials:**

sportweight yarn:
mc: 105 (135, 165)yds / 95 (125, 150)m
cc: 90 (115, 145)yds / 85 (105, 135)m
3mm / us 2.5 16” / 40cm circular needle + dpns

**finished measurements:**

actual unstretched circumference: 17.25 (19.5, 21.5)” / 44 (49.5, 54.5)cm
to fit head: 19-20 (21-22, 23-24)” / 48-51 (53-56, 58-61)cm

*sample shown in malabrigo arroyo shades pearl (mc) and azul profundo (cc)*

  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/peggotty
